JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a Technical Program Manager (TPM) with large-scale distributed software systems experience and a background in data/machine learning systems. This person will be deeply involved in identifying longer term strategies and building scalable, secure, reliable, efficient, and privacy focused Data and ML products and platforms. This person will partner closely with engineering, product and other cross-functional teams to identify problem statements, create roadmaps, scope programs aligning them with business priorities, define milestones and success metric, and drive them to completion by aligning and leading large cross-functional teams.Build strong and aligned program teams to efficiently deliver on shared
